20101211030708.667|20101211030710.333|CCO|>> GRETA: LET ME TELL YOU WHAT
20101211030710.333|20101211030712.000|CCO|I THINK ABOUT THE WORD
20101211030712.000|20101211030713.429|CCO|"PERMANENTLY" I THINK THE
20101211030713.429|20101211030714.857|CCO|AMERICAN PEOPLE ARE A LITTLE
20101211030714.857|20101211030716.286|CCO|HAD.
20101211030716.286|20101211030717.714|CCO|THERE WERE TAX CUTS IN THE
20101211030717.714|20101211030719.143|CCO|REAGAN ADMINISTRATION THEY
20101211030719.143|20101211030720.571|CCO|WERE NOT PERMANENT BECAUSE IT
20101211030720.571|20101211030722.000|CCO|-- THIS IDEA OF PERMANENT EVEN
20101211030722.000|20101211030724.000|CCO|IF THEY ARE AND YOU PASS THEM

20101211030726.000|20101211030728.000|CCO|AND CHANG THEM AGAIN.
20101211030728.000|20101211030730.000|CCO|PERMANENT IS A MISNOMER.
20101211030730.000|20101211030732.000|CCO|UNLESS, YOU PASS A TAX BILL
20101211030732.000|20101211030734.000|CCO|WITH A SUPER MAJORITY SO IT
